file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 53-21-02-03 - MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLERS - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLERS - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to lubricate the main-door frame rollers. B. There are four rollers at the main-door frame. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLERS - LUBRI- ALL 53-21-02-600-801-A ♦ CATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 53-21-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-21-02-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLERS - LUBRICATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to lubricate the main-door frame rollers. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 53-21-02-000-802-A/400 MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLER - REMOVAL AMM TASK 53-21-02-400-802-A/400 MAIN-DOOR FRAME ROLLER - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-C-16173, GR3 WD40 Lubricant AR ASTM-D-740 Methyl-Ethyl-Ketone (MEK) AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main-door frame I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the main door. J. Lubrication of Main-Door Frame Rollers (Figure 301) SUBTASK 640-002-A (1) Remove the main-door frame rollers from their supports ( AMM TASK 53-21-02-000-802-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 53-21-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL WARNING: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE THE METHYL-ETHYL-KETONE (MEK). PUT ON SAFETY GOGGLES, PROTECTIVE GLOVES AND CLOTHING. DO NOT BREATHE THE GAS. DO THE WORK IN AN AREA WHICH HAS A GOOD FLOW OF AIR. THE METHYL-ETHYL-KETONE (MEK) IS POISONOUS AND HIGHLY FLAMMABLE. (2) Clean the rollers and their supports with a clean cloth soaked in solvent MEK. (3) Lubricate the rollers and their supports with WD40. (4) Install the rollers on their supports ( AMM TASK 53-21-02-400-802-A/400). NOTE: Make sure that the rollers move freely in the circumferential direction. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the main door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 53-21-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Main-Door Frame Rollers - Lubrication Figure 301 STA 5292.0 STA 4514.0 A ZONES 231 B DET. A 1 WD40 DET. B 1 MAKE SURE THAT THE ROLLERS MOVE FREELY IN THE CIRCUMFERENTIAL DIRECTION, DURING THE LUBRICATION. EM145AMM530025B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 53-21-02 Page 4 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
